name: Bad Chemicals
description:
This is an interactive music video for the song "Bad Chemicals" off of my album "Life and Back."

You can listen to the full album at http://www.BenLevinGroup.BandCamp.com

It runs right above in the browser once you install Unity Web Player. Unfortunately, Web Player is not currently compatible with Google Chrome. See below for Download options so that you can experience the interactive video on your standalone computer rather than on the browser.
